DOCUMENT 9
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
5/20/2024 5:09 PM
70-DR-2023-900051.01
CIRCUIT COURT OF
TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR
Plaintiff
v. CASE NO.: 70-DR-23-900051.01
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND
Defendant
MOTION TO SET CONTEMPT SHOW CAUSE HEARING
COMES NOW, Petitioner BRITTANY GILLILAND, by and through the undersigned
counsel of record, Barbara H. Agricola and Matthew Holdren, with the law firm of Agricola Law,
LLC, and files this Motion to Set Hearing in the above-styled cause. In support thereof, Petitioner
states the following:
1. That in her Petition for Contempt, Petitioner requested the Court set the matter for a show
cause hearing.
2. That Respondent has been properly served with the Petition for Contempt, and has filed a
responsive pleading.
3. Since being served, Respondent has continued to violate the Courtâ€™s Order.
4. Petitioner hereby requests the Court set this matter for a hearing on the next available
docket, requiring Respondent to show cause as to why he should not be held in contempt.
WHEREFORE, PREMISES CONSIDERED, Petitioner respectfully prays that this Court
GRANT this Motion, and set this matter for a hearing on the next available docket, requiring
Respondent to show cause as to why he should not be held in contempt.
Respectfully submitted on May 20, 2024.
/s/ Matthew Holdren
/s/ Barbara H. Agricola (AGR004)
Brittany Michelle Gilliland v. Christopher Blaine McGregor
Circuit Court of Tallapoosa County
Case No.: 70-DR-23-900051.01
Motion to Set for Hearing
